import { PlayArrow, Add, ThumbDownAltOutlined, ThumbUpAltOutlined } from '@material-ui/icons' import React, { useState } from 'react' import './listItem.scss' const ListItem = ({index}) => { const [isHovered, setIsHovered] = useState(false); return (
setIsHovered(true)} onMouseLeave={() => setIsHovered(false)} style={{left: isHovered && index*255-50+ index}}>
